page.title: 19RELIGION
page.content: RELIGION THE REVEREND CHRISTOPHER HUITSON M.A. IS THE VICAR OF ST. LAWRENCE, WILLINGTON AND ALL SAINTS ,COPLE,AND PART-TIME CHAPLAIN AT N.WING ,BEDFORD GENERAL HOSPITAL.HE TRAINED AT KEBLE AND CUDDESDON COLLEGES,OXFORD AND WAS ORDAINED IN 1969 AT CANTERBURY CATHEDRAL.ON ALTERNATE TUESDAYS HE COMES TO SCHOOL TO TAKE OUR ASSEMBLY. THE METHODIST MINISTER IS THE REVEREND PETER WHITTAKER B.A. HE TRAINED AT THE THEOLOGICAL COLLEGE AND UNIVERSITY IN MANCHESTER.REV.WHITTAKER DOES NOT LIVE IN THE VILLAGE BECAUSE HE LOOKS AFTER A CHURCH IN CARDINGTON, ANOTHER IN THE LONDON ROAD AREA OF BEDFORD ,AND ONE IN THE AMPTHILL ROAD WHICH HAS ENGLISH AND PUNJABI SPEAKING CONGREGATIONS.HE,TOO,TAKES OUR ASSEMBLY ON ALTERNATE TUESDAYS.
